ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: To Luciana Santos Barbosa, Iury Amâncio Paiva and Luzia Maria de Oliveira Pinto (Viral Immunology Laboratory, Oswaldo Cruz Institute, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil) for their help and assistance with sample collection, to Ana Maria Bispo de Filippis, Patricia Carvalho de Sequeira, Cíntia Damasceno, Simone Alves Sampaio and Eliane Saraiva Machado de Araújo (Flavivirus Laboratory, Oswaldo Cruz Institute, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil) and Rose Mary (LACEN/ AP) for technical support. To the Parasite Biology Postgraduate Program, Oswaldo Cruz Institute/FIOCRUZ. To Laboratory of Hantavirus and Rickettsial Diseases (LHR) headed by Dr. Elba Lemos and the Laboratory of Respiratory Virus and Measles (LVRS) headed by Dr. Marilda Siqueira for allowing the technical support when necessary. To the Sequencing Platform-PDTIS/FIOCRUZ, for the technical support.
